original_title: Ufo Chronicles: Pilot Encounters And Undergroud Bases
overview: Commander Graham Bethune is a retired Navy commander pilot with a top-secret clearance. He was a VIP Plane Commander who flew most of the high-ranking officers and civilians from Washington D.C. In his testimony he explains how he was flying a group of VIP's and other pilots into Argentia, Newfoundland when they all witnessed a 300 foot UFO that traveled 10,000 feet straight up in a fraction of a second toward their plane and was on radar.
title: Ufo Chronicles: Pilot Encounters And Undergroud Bases
